channel.title: Help with small issue
channel.description: Hey I need another favor to ask someone. I need to find the file that will send a server message like every 10 mins (ex. [server]Check out our forums at -asdforums.com-- I had this file and went to bed then I lost it =..(. Can anyone tell me what file this is in? It's a 562 server. You will get Rep +

item.title: Help with small issue
item.dc:creator: @Samih1996 Samih1996
item.description:
@Samih1996 wrote:

not many people use a code like that but if u go to your source, then data and then scripts edit the “authentication.py”
and then inssert this before any other codes.

# called when a player logs in def login(player): player.getActionSender().sendMessage("<shad=0066ff>Check out our forums at<img=1>-asdforums.com-<img=1>"); return
Every player will get that message everytime they login, Dont do it every 10 seconds because that will be spamm and the players wont like it.

Read full topic
